description: Peaches.  Except they're not native to Earth.  And they don't rot.  And they make you inconveniently difficult to deal with, like making your skin unpierceable or turning you immortal.  At least they used to.

//: These are just sweet potatoes, but I find the word funny
description: Reddish to purple tubers on the outside, go from yellow to greenish in the inside.  Not actually related to potatoes.
//2: Values according to the Nutrition table at the Potato article in wikipedia.  Btw, vitA according to carrot values should be 1106
